title: Witch Doctor
summaries: The Witch Doctor is an NPC vendor that will spawn once the following criteria have been met:

• There is an empty house.
  • Queen Bee has been defeated.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Witch Doctor will shoot <linked>Poison Darts</linked> at nearby <linked>enemies</linked> with a <linked>Blowgun</linked> to defend himself. In addition to <linked>poisoning</linked> enemies, his darts deal 20 / <linked>30</linked> / <linked>35</linked> damage at the start of the game, and (on the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>) as players progress he will gain <linked>various stat increases</linked>.

statistics.Damage: 203035 (Poison Dart)
